verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How firm a foundation newline Ye saints of the Lord, newline Is laid for your faith newline In His excellent word, newline What more can He say newline Than to you He hath said, newline To you who for refuge newline To Jesus have fled.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Fear not I am with Thee newline O be not dismayed, newline For I am Thy God newline And will still give Thee aid, newline I'll strengthen Thee help Thee newline And cause Thee to stand, newline Upheld by my righteous omnipotent hand.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When through fiery trials newline Thy pathway shall lie, newline My grace all sufficient newline Shall be Thy supply, newline The flame shall not hurt Thee newline I only design, newline Thy dross to consume newline And Thy gold to refine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When through the deep waters newline I call Thee to go, newline The rivers of sorrow newline Shall not overflow, newline For I will be with Thee newline I only design, newline And sanctify to Thee newline Thy deepest distress.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The soul that on Jesus newline Hath leaned for repose, newline I will not I will not newline Desert to His foes, newline That soul though all hell newline Should endeavor to shake, newline I'll never no never newline No never forsake.
